oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Evaluation of an O-antigen ELISA for screening cattle herds for Salmonella typhimurium
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hoorfar, J.
Bitsch, V.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Salmonella typhimurium
antibodies
dairy cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A total of 2585 serum samples from 62 dairy herds located in four different regions of Denmark were tested in an O-antigen (0:1,4,5,12)-based ELISA for the detection of antibodies against Salmonella typhimurium.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1995; 81
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Copyright (c) 1995 American Association of Bovine Practitioners
